title: Turn the Constant into log
text: Use the definition of logarithm, we can get $$2=\log_{2}\left(4\right)$$ since $$2^2=4$$.

title: Match Bases
text: With all term containing same log base, the log can be removed, so it becomes $$x \left(x-3\right)=4$$. We can simplify into $$x^2-3x-4=0$$. We can factor the quadratic and get $$\left(x-4\right) \left(x+1\right)=0$$ which has $$x=4$$ and $$x=-1$$ as solutions.

title: Check for Constrains
text: Given $$\log_{a}\left(b\right)$$, $$b$$ can not be negative. We can omit the negative answer and get $$x=4$$ as the only solution for the equation.
